verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and <S%H6318>Potiphar<s%>, an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>, an <S%H376%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, <S%H7069>bought<s%> him of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%>, which had brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> thither.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and he was a <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>; and he was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>.
And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with him, and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and he <S%H8334>served<s%> him: and he made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> over his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all that he <S%H3426>had<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it came to pass from the <S%H227>time<s%> that he had made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and over all that he <S%H3426>had<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1558>sake<s%>; and the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon all that he <S%H3426>had<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

And he <S%H5800>left<s%> all that he had in <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and he <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H3972>ought<s%> he had, <S%H518>save<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> which he did <S%H398>eat<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was a <S%H8389>goodly<s%> person, and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favoured<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that his <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5375>cast<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7901>Lie<s%> with me.

But he <S%H3985>refused<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, Behold, my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3045>wotteth<s%> not what is with me in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and he hath <S%H5414>committed<s%> all that he <S%H3426>hath<s%> to my <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

There is none <S%H1419>greater<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%> than I; <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath he kept <S%H2820>back<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%> from me but thee, <S%H834>because<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art his <S%H802>wife<s%>: how then can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, and <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>?

And it came to pass, as she <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto her, to <S%H7901>lie<s%> by <S%H681>her<s%>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this <S%H3117>time<s%>, that Joseph <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4399>business<s%>; and there was none of the <S%H376%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> there within.

And she <S%H8610>caught<s%> him by his <S%H899>garment<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7901>Lie<s%> with me: and he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H3318>got<s%> him <S%H2351>out<s%>.
And it came to pass, when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and was <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>forth<s%>,

That she <S%H7121>called<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, he hath brought <S%H935>in<s%> an <S%H376%H5680>Hebrew<s%> unto us to <S%H6711>mock<s%> us; he came <S%H935>in<s%> unto me to <S%H7901>lie<s%> with me, and I <S%H7121>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>:

And it came to pass, when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%>, that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> with <S%H681>me<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and got <S%H3318>him<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%>.
And she laid <S%H3240>up<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> by <S%H681>her<s%>, until his <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>.

And she <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him according to these <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%>, which thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> unto us, came <S%H935>in<s%> unto me to <S%H6711>mock<s%> me:

And it came to pass, as I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%>, that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> with <S%H681>me<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%>.

And it came to pass, when his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, which she <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, After this <S%H1697>manner<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> to me; that his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and put <S%H5414>him<s%> into the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%>, a <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H615>prisoners<s%> were <S%H631>bound<s%>: and he was there in the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%>.

¶ But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H5186>shewed<s%> him <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2580>favour<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%> <S%H5414>committed<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> all the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> that were in the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%>; and whatsoever they <S%H6213>did<s%> there, he was the <S%H6213>doer<s%> of it.

The <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004%H5470>prison<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> not to any <S%H3972>thing<s%> that was under his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with him, and that which he <S%H6213>did<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made it to <S%H6743>prosper<s%>.
